snippet: Gay and straight Mormons have begun challenging the church’s leadership on its opposition to homosexuality.
abstract: Gay and straight Mormons, as legal battle over ban on same-sex marriage heads to the Supreme Court, are making increasingly vocal calls for church leaders to reconsider their stance on gay marriage and welcome openly gay congregants back into the church.
lead_paragraph: Gay and straight Mormons have begun challenging the church’s leadership on its opposition to homosexuality.

headline.seo: Dissent on Gay Marriage Among Mormons
headline.main: Gentle Dissent in Mormon Church on Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Gentle Dissent in Mormon Church on Gay Marriage
